txt.en: 'Do you remember the beginning of our journey? It all began with a cookbook!'
'Every now and then I remember our time in Wildermore, and it gives me the shivers!'
'I wonder if I could climb the Stocktower without any trouble now?'
'I am glad I eventually learned to swim... but no need to use that skill for now.'
'I have not been the subject of a Myrtle Boggs petition lately. I hope she is well!'
'It was not easy leaving the Shire, but I am glad I had the experience!'
'Prisca asked me to host more dinner parties. I think she really enjoyed it!'
'Has Marigold been asking you about dragons? She seems very interested in them.'
'I wonder what Tom Bombadil and Goldberry are up to these days?'
'Do you ever get the feeling that we might not have been talking to the same Bert Bartleby?'
'Do you remember our walk into the Barrow-downs? That was a spooky day!'
'I was most frightened on my journey when we encountered that wraith in Rohan.'
'It was good of Tanglemane to carry me away from that frightful wraith in Rohan. He is a smart pony!'
'I hope the Rohirrim are able to rebuild their homes. Seeing that land in war makes me sad.'
'During the party, I gave Willem and his family the finest of meat pies so they would want to return often!'
'Do you think the Rothstone was really cursed? Theodore definitely thought so!'
'I still can't believe we went into a dragon's lair, my friend. And we did it on purpose!'
'The Welcoming Feasts of Maur Tulhau should come with a warning, especially for hobbits like me!'
'Our friends from Maur Tulhau told me that they enjoyed the dinner party very much. I am so glad!'
'I hope that Bloody Graham has good luck as a farmer. Maybe he should change his name, though.'
'Donnamira Took told me that my spelling and grammar are not very good. Very well? Oh, I don't know!'
'Did you really deliver all those invitations by hand, my friend? You can be honest with me!'
'I am so grateful to have met you, and to have shared in this delightful adventure!'
'I was thinking about the Prancing Pony the other day when I drank a little too much ale.'
'I remember meeting Theodore and Haley for the first time. I liked them at once!'
'One day we should ask Haley to write some more riddles. I could use the challenge!'
'I wonder what Haley and Theodore are up to these days?'
'You do not truly appreciate sleeping in a feather bed until you have slept outside!'
'I am so glad we helped Willem Whisker out of that trap in the Trollshaws!'
'It was a real pleasure to meet Bilbo in Rivendell. I hope he likes my book!'
'I hope my book will be exciting enough for Bilbo. I think it will be!'
'I know now that Spalvi was a Dourhand, but I would have wanted to heal his injuries anyway!'
'When the Dourhands captured me, Spalvi was very kind and freed me quickly. He is a good dwarf!'
'I meant to ask. How did you know dropping supplies down the hole would be safe?'
'You really dropped things down the hole on top of me? That was not just a joke?'
'Spalvi told me that you and W.W. spent a long time looking for me when I was lost. Thank you!'
'I think Spalvi is much more a Stout-heart than a Dourhand now.'
'Spalvi told me about the Rothstone afterwards. I did not know he had it when he freed me.'
'Theodore told me about his adventures in Eregion. I am sad I missed that land!'
'I still can't believe I forgot everything when I fell beneath the mountains. Most peculiar!'
'I was always a very slow and methodical reader, but I have been getting faster!'
'Ketill showed me some of his maps, but I did not recognize them. It was embarrassing.'
'I never did read all those Elvish books in Lothlórien. I hope Galadriel was not offended.'
'Even today I shiver when I remember our stay in the Haunted Inn.'
'I know Adolinda says she deserved her curse, but still I feel bad for her.'
'Do you remember when it seemed everyone wanted me to eat spider legs? That was not funny!'
'It was nice of Maervadhor to come all this way for my party. He brought me a gift of ink!'
'Langhár told me that she is still being courted by Sabert. She seemed unsure what to think about it.'
'Do you remember when we drove the Easterlings from Stangard? I played a pivotal role, as I remember!'
'I still think we could have walked across Rohan, but I am glad to have met Tanglemane.'
'I remember meeting Tanglemane for the first time. What a good boy he was, and is!'
'Egwylf told me that the Blood Eye Cult seems to have been dealt with. That is a relief!'
